resource.title: Occupational Therapy
resource.text: We can help your child overcome sensory challenges and enhance their ability to learn, interact with others and enjoy life.

resource.title: Nutrition Counseling
resource.text: Let us help you and your child stay healthy, how to choose foods wisely and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

resource.title: Speech & Language
resource.text: We can help you grow communication skills which is fundamental in order interact and connect with others.

resource.title: ABA Therapy
resource.text: Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) uses the scientific principles of learning and motivation in order to effectively teach.

resource.title: Integrating Therapy Into The Classroom
resource.text: By R.A. McWilliam & Stacy Scott Here is a great research paper discussing the importance of integrating therapy into the classroom from the National Individualizing Preschool Inclusion Project.

resource.title: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)
resource.text: The UDL fact sheet is an excellent educational resource from the American Occupational Therapy Association.
